amendatorysection.catchline: Ephedrine, pseudoephedrine, or phenylpropanolamine; possession; penalty.
amendatorysection.para: No person shall possess ephedrine, pseudoephedrine, or phenylpropanolamine, or their salts, isomers, or salts of isomers, with the intent to manufacture methamphetamine. Any person who violates this section is guilty of a Class IV felony.
